channel.title: CVE Feed for DOGROW.NET -- Simple Baseball Scoreboard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DOGROW.NET -- Simple Baseball Scoreboard

item.title: CVE-2024-48025|2024-10-17T13:02:08.087Z -- dogrow.net -- simple%20baseball%20scoreboard
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in DOGROW.NET Simple Baseball Scoreboard allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Baseball Scoreboard: from n/a through 1.3.
